message: Week3.json quality verification PASSED. File location: study-site/src/data/weeks/week3.json (lines 1-549). All 17 questions verified against 5-Second Quality Rule: (1) Correct explanations explain WHY with proper mechanisms, (2) Proper citations included (Pavlov, Watson, Skinner, Thorndike, Seligman, Öhman, Tolman, Köhler), (3) Each incorrect explanation is specific to that option, (4) Clear contrasts and misconception corrections present, (5) Educational value confirmed - students would understand their mistakes. No modifications required.
